parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.36</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> DLC </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global</value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Arguments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns appID of the DLC the object belongs to or [[nil]] if object is vanilla. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''getObjectDLC''' obj </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value>  obj: [[Object]] </value></part><part><name/>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]] (or [[Nothing]] if vanilla item) </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 


</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_appID = [[getObjectDLC]] [[cursorTarget]];
[[if]] (![[isNil]] "_appID") [[then]] {
	[[hint]] [[format]] ["This object belongs to DLC with id: %1", _appID];
} [[else]] {
	[[hint]] "This object is vanilla";
};</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_akm = [[createSimpleObject]] ["A3\Weapons_F_Exp\Rifles\AKM\AKM_F.p3d",[[getPosASL]] [[player]]];
[[getObjectDLC]] _akm;	<template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>395180</value></part></template></code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value> 

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[getDLCs]], [[getPersonUsedDLCs]], [[getMissionDLCs]], [[getDLCAssetsUsageByName]], [[getDLCAssetsUsage]], [[getAssetDLCInfo]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="7"/><value>  </value></part><part><name>MPBEHAVIOUR</name>=<value>
